The exact role of autoantibodies in causation of antisynthetase syndrome is not yet known.",GARD,Antisynthetase syndrome
How to diagnose Antisynthetase syndrome ?,"How is antisynthetase syndrome diagnosed? A diagnosis of antisynthetase syndrome is often suspected based on the presence of characteristic signs
